survey_properties.intro_message: Please take a few minutes to let us know how your day has been

questions.question_title: How much sleep did you get last night?
Have you taken any medication today? If so, please indicate the number of times you took a medication
How much alcohol have you today?
choices: A glass of wine/two bottles of beer/one tot of whisky or less
More than one glass of wine/two bottles of beer/one tot of whisky

questions.question_title: Do you smoke? If so, please indicate the number of cigarettes you have smoked today
